title: Nigel Farage
deleted: Farage is considered a controversial figure in British politics.<ref>{{cite web|title=Nigel Farage: One of the most controversial and successful politicians of all time|url=https://www.itv.com/news/2016-07-04/nigel-farage-one-of-the-most-controversial-and-successful-politicians-of-all-time|website=ITV|date=4 July 2016}}</ref> Supporters have praised him for offering an alternative in politics and Euroscepticism.<ref>{{cite web|title=Meet the Most Controversial Man in the U.K. Elections|url=https://time.com/3846925/nigel-farage-uk-election/|website=TIME|last=Bajekal|first=Naina|date=6 May 2015}}</ref> Critics{{who|date=September 2021}} have accused him of xenophobia.<ref>{{cite news|title=Nigel Farage resigns: The outgoing Ukip leader's most controversial moments|url=https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/nigel-farage-resigns-ukip-leader-brexit-leave-most-controversial-moments-racism-sexism-immigration-a7118801.html|newspaper=The Independent|last=Stone|first=Jon|date=4 July 2016}}</ref>
